main event: Several bright circular objects emitting a bluish-white light were sighted by trained personnel of the Illinois National Guard near the town of Macomb, Illinois. The objects traveled at high speed, periodically reversing their direction and greatly exceeding the speed of any known aerial vehicle.
interesting points: The objects were observed for approximately 12 minutes and were estimated to be 5 miles from the observers.
Trained personnel of the Illinois National Guard were conducting routine night maneuvers at the time of the sighting.
The objects emitted a bluish-white light and traveled in straight line flight, periodically reversing their direction.
The incident report is being investigated, and further details will be forwarded as they become available.
The report is declassified after 12 years, and investigations are ongoing.
sighted object: bright circular objects emitting bluish-white light
witnesses: trained personnel of the Illinois National Guard
